title: Silo Configuration
description: Configuration file for silo - run AI coding tools in isolated containers

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for editor autocompletion and validation

backend.description: Backend to use for running containers. 'docker' uses Docker, 'container' uses Apple's lightweight VMs. Default: 'container' if installed, else 'docker'

tool.description: Default tool to run. If not set, an interactive prompt is shown.

mounts_ro.description: Read-only directories or files to mount into the container. Paths starting with ~ are expanded to home directory.

mounts_rw.description: Read-write directories or files to mount into the container. Paths starting with ~ are expanded to home directory.

env.description: Environment variables. Names without '=' pass through from host, names with '=' set explicitly (e.g., 'FOO=bar').

pre_run_hooks.description: Shell commands to run inside the container before the tool starts. Useful for dynamic setup that depends on the mounted working directory.

post_build_hooks.description: Shell commands to run inside the container after building the image. These are baked into the image and cached.

tools.description: Tool-specific configuration. Each key is a tool name (e.g., 'claude', 'opencode', 'copilot').

repos.description: Repository-specific configuration. Each key is a substring to match against git remote URLs. When the current directory is a git repository and any remote URL contains the key as a substring, that configuration is applied.

toolConfig.description: Configuration specific to a single tool. These settings are merged with global config when running that tool.

mounts_ro.description: Read-only directories or files to mount for this tool only.

mounts_rw.description: Read-write directories or files to mount for this tool only.

env.description: Environment variables for this tool only. Same format as global env.

pre_run_hooks.description: Shell commands to run inside the container before this tool starts.

post_build_hooks.description: Shell commands to run in the Dockerfile for this tool's build stage.

repoConfig.description: Configuration specific to a git repository. Applied when any git remote URL contains the key as a substring.

mounts_ro.description: Read-only directories or files to mount for this repository.

mounts_rw.description: Read-write directories or files to mount for this repository.

env.description: Environment variables for this repository. Same format as global env.

pre_run_hooks.description: Shell commands to run inside the container before the tool starts.

post_build_hooks.description: Shell commands to run in the Dockerfile.
